title: The details of the tenement that would be given to them by way of allotment on the same basis as for those who have joined the scheme will be communicated to them in writing by the Implementation Agency
clause_text: The details of the tenement that would be given to them by way of allotment on the same basis as for those who have joined the scheme will be communicated to them in writing by the Implementation Agency.
section: Process of Allotment to Beneficiaries and Conditions thereof :-
